translations.The subject is too long or empty: Mada ni ndefu sana au tupu
translations.This app allows admins to post announcem: Programu hii inaruhusu wasimamizi kuchapisha matangazo.
translations.Announce your maintenance window 🎛️, int:
Tangaza dirisha lako la matengenezo 🎛️, mtambulishe mfanyakazi mwenzako mpya 👤 au uhakikishe kuwa kila mtu anajua kuhusu tukio hilo kubwa mwezi ujao 📅

🖌️ Usaidizi wa kuweka alama chini

📑 Maoni yakiwemo @-mentions

👪 Ruhusa za kikundi

⭕ Muunganisho wa Dashibodi

⚡ Ujumuishaji wa shughuli

🔔 Ujumuishaji wa arifa
translations.An error occurred while changing the set: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kubadilisha mpangilio
translations.An error occurred while removing the not: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kuondoa arifa za tangazo
translations.An error occurred while deleting the ann: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kufuta tangazo
translations.An error occurred while posting the anno: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kuchapisha tangazo
translations.Write announcement text, Markdown can be: Andika maandishi ya tangazo, Markdown inaweza kutumika ..
translations.These groups will be able to see the ann: Makundi haya yataweza kuona tangazo. Ikiwa hakuna kikundi kilichochaguliwa, watumiaji wote wanaweza kukiona.
